title: 10-Year UAE Golden Residency
description: Awarded a 10-year UAE Golden Residency for academic excellence (valid until 2033).

title: Top 1% on TryHackMe
description: Ranked in the top 1% of players on TryHackMe, demonstrating advanced cybersecurity skills and practical problem-solving abilities.

title: Daily Skill Development
description: Dedicating 6 hours daily for learning and practicing, completing a new course every 3 days, handling a new security scenario every day, and progressing consistently from certification to certification.

title: Practical Certifications Focus
description: Proudly avoiding "HR Filter" theoretical certifications. Only seeking hands-on, practical cybersecurity certifications.

title: University Honor List Recognition (3 Times)
description: Recognized on the University Honor List for 3 consecutive semesters for outstanding academic performance in Cybersecurity.

title: Cultural Insight
description: Resided in the UAE for over 20 years, gaining strong cultural insight and deep local familiarity.

title: Licensed Driver
description: Held a valid UAE light vehicle license with 3 years of driving experience, ensuring professional mobility.
